title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 225: Featuring Kevin Hayes
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by “The Best One” Kevin Hayes. Kevin joins the show to talk about his transition to Philly, playing for a new team, some stories about his new teammates and more. The guys also touch on some NHL news, including the red hot Minnesota Wild and Colorado Avalanche along with the news that Nathan MacKinnon will once again tell less money on his next contract. The guys wrap up with a gambling corner from RA and touch on the Patrick Reed cheating situation.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
